Gillette Stadium History

1 Patriot Place, Foxborough MA 02035

Years Active: 2002-2025 (219 games)

Surfaces: grass (2002-2005), fieldturf (2006-2025)

Teams:

  • New England Patriots (2002-2025)
  •  Regular Season: 143-51-0
  •  Playoffs: 21-4
